data.persona: I am a scullery boy doing domestic work in a household. I cook and clean and do errands for the lord of the house. I am a teenager and take pride in my work.
data.description:
You are in the Inside Tower.
The walls and are made of marble and trimmed in gold.  So too are the winding stairs that lead up to the observation deck.  Ivy lines the outside of the walls and sprawls all the way up the side to just near the top of the tower.  The tower itself is intimidating for those who dare to approach.  The tower stands tall so as to see out way across the beautiful land it watches over.
There's a castle, a beautiful farmland, a gold, a countryside, a beautiful land, a wall, a vessel, a plate, a Stair, and an observation deck here.
The person and the traveler are here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I want to brush the lord's horse so he is happy with me.
data.mid_motivation: I want to ask the lord for a vacation for me and my family.
data.long_motivation: I want to visit my dying uncle in the neighboring kingdom
